title: prinzip.zufall_[random.principle].2011.HDRip.1268x540.H264
description:
title			Prinzip Zufall [random principle]
shooting format		Super8 Cinemascope Kodak Vision 200
digital format	        SD, h264, AAC
subtitles		english / german / french subtitles 
length			26 min

Director                Romeo Grünfelder
Screenplay              Romeo Grünfelder
Director of photography Simon Rittmeier
Composer                Thomas Meadowcroft
Sound                   Stefan Fendrich
Production company      felderfilm, Hamburg
cast                    Dr. Johannes Hagel, Yakup Aydin, Roland Appelt

genre			docu fiction, shortfilm


Festivals (selection)
(2011) CPH:DOX, Kopenhagen
(2011) Short Film Festival, Hamburg
(2012) FIPA, Biarritz
(2013) IndieLisboa, Lissabon



SYNOPSIS 
In an experiment with a train set the psycho-physicist Dr. John Hagel examined unexplained phenomena of syncronicity. According to his statistics, the train set shouldn’t show abnormalities after several thousand passes. Surprisingly the psycho-physicists observed, however, something entirely else.



REVIEWS

"PRINZIP ZUFALL is definetely one of the most fascinating films I've seen this year."
Paolo Moretti, Programmer, Venice Film Biennale

"When I saw PRINZIP ZUFALL I was completely mesmerized."
Mads Mikkelsen, Programmer, CPH:DOX

"Great cast, wonderful combination of aerial photos of the city with the principle of model railway and a rest in the narrative that I find rare."
Andreas Platthaus, FAZ

"It's not cinema, it's art."
Olaf Stüber, Gallerist Berlin
